korean: 오늘 퇴사하시는 선배님한테 업무를 인수인계 받았다.
아침부터 저녁까지 하루 종일 회의실에서 설명 들었어.
담당하던 프로젝트마다 주의사항이랑 팁도 다 적어주셨어.
모르는 부분은 질문했고, 선배님이 친절하게 설명해주셨다.
중간에 머리가 터질 것 같아서 커피 마시면서 잠깐 쉬었다.
선배님이 회사 생활하면서 배운 점들도 공유해주셨어.
인수인계 끝나고 감사 인사드리고 연락처도 주고받았다.
다음 주부터 혼자 해야 한다고 생각하니까 부담되지만 잘해야지.
선배님께 누가 되지 않게 열심히 해야지.
english: I received a handover from a senior colleague who's leaving the company today.
From morning till evening, I basically spent the whole day in a meeting room listening to explanations.
They organized everything so thoroughly in documents—I'm really grateful.
They wrote down all the important notes and tips for each project they handled.
I asked about things I didn't understand, and they kindly explained everything.
My brain felt like it was gonna explode in the middle, so we took a coffee break.
They also shared insights they learned during their time at the company.
After the handover, I thanked them and we exchanged contact info.
It's a bit overwhelming knowing I'll be on my own next week, but I'll do my best.
I should read through the documents again and get as familiar as possible.
It'll be tough at first, but I'll get used to it as I go.
I gotta work hard so I don't let them down.
